landing.title: PsycheMirror
landing.subtitle: Your Mental Health Companion
landing.description: Comprehensive emotional wellness tracking and therapy recommendations
landing.subtagline: AI-powered emotional insight mirror for mental wellness
landing.aboutDescription: Hello, we are PsycheMirror, determined AI developers with a strong dedication to supporting mental wellness by providing directions toward understanding people's mental health. Guiding minds, healing hearts, finding peace.

features.facialDesc: Advanced AI analyzes facial expressions to detect emotions in real-time
features.voiceDesc: Understand emotional state through voice patterns and tone analysis
features.textDesc: AI-powered text analysis to understand emotional context from written words
features.therapyDesc: Get personalized therapy recommendations based on your emotional analysis
features.connectDesc: Seamless connection with mental health professionals for ongoing support

landing.servicesSubtitle: Comprehensive services for mind and wellness

detect.title: Detect
detect.description: Our AI analyzes your facial expressions, voice tone, and text to understand your emotional state.

analyze.title: Analyze
analyze.description: Advanced algorithms process your emotional data to provide comprehensive insights.

heal.title: Heal
heal.description: Receive personalized therapy recommendations and connect with mental health professionals.

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.content: PsycheMirror has helped me understand my emotions better than ever before. The AI analysis is incredibly accurate.

michael.name: Dr. Michael Chen
michael.content: This platform has revolutionized how I track my patients' emotional patterns. Highly recommended.

emma.name: Emma Rodriguez
emma.content: The therapy recommendations are spot-on. It feels like having a personal therapist available 24/7.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.commitmentDesc: PsycheMirror is committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. We understand that mental health data is extremely sensitive, and we have implemented industry-leading security measures to ensure your information remains confidential and secure.

dataProtectionItems.encryption: End-to-end encryption: All your emotional data and personal information is encrypted using military-grade encryption protocols.
dataProtectionItems.hipaa: HIPAA compliance: Our data storage and processing systems meet or exceed HIPAA requirements for healthcare data.
dataProtectionItems.servers: Secure servers: All data is stored on secure, encrypted servers with regular security audits.
dataProtectionItems.access: Access controls: Only authorized personnel with proper clearance can access your data.

dataRightsItems.ownership: Data ownership: You retain full ownership of your personal information and emotional data.
dataRightsItems.portability: Data portability: You can export your data at any time in a standard format.
dataRightsItems.deletion: Data deletion: You can request complete deletion of your data from our systems.
dataRightsItems.consent: Consent control: You have full control over what data is shared and with whom.

privacy.dataUsageDesc: We never sell your personal information to third parties. We may use anonymized, aggregated data for research purposes to improve our services, but this data cannot be traced back to individual users. Any data sharing requires your explicit consent.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.agreementDesc: By using PsycheMirror, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully before using our platform.

serviceUsageItems.legitimate: Use PsycheMirror only for legitimate mental wellness and emotional tracking purposes.
serviceUsageItems.accurate: Provide accurate and truthful information during registration and use.
serviceUsageItems.respect: Respect other users and maintain professional conduct in all interactions.
serviceUsageItems.hack: Do not attempt to hack, reverse engineer, or compromise our systems.

dataPrivacyItems.encrypted: Your emotional data is encrypted and stored securely according to our Privacy Policy.
dataPrivacyItems.ownership: You retain ownership of your personal information and emotional data.
dataPrivacyItems.anonymized: We may use anonymized, aggregated data for research and service improvement.
dataPrivacyItems.consent: You consent to data processing necessary for service provision.

limitationsItems.notReplacement: PsycheMirror is not a replacement for professional therapy or medical treatment.
limitationsItems.emergency: In emergency situations, contact emergency services immediately (911).
limitationsItems.notLiable: We are not liable for misuse of the platform or decisions made based on our insights.
limitationsItems.informational: Our AI analysis is for informational purposes only and should not replace professional judgment.

terminationItems.terminate: You may terminate your account at any time by contacting support.
terminationItems.reserve: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
terminationItems.deletion: Upon termination, you may request deletion of your data according to our Privacy Policy.

footer.tagline: AI-powered emotional insight mirror for mental wellness
footer.downloadDesc: Get PsycheMirror on your mobile device for on-the-go emotional tracking.

patient.greeting: How are you feeling today? Let's check in with your emotional wellness.
patient.startFirstTherapy: Start your first therapy session to see tracking data here.
patient.completeFirstAnalysis: Complete your first emotion analysis to see your history here.
patient.welcomeJourney: Welcome to Your Mental Health Journey
patient.analysisDescription: Get started with a comprehensive analysis of your emotional state through facial expression, voice tone, and text sentiment analysis. This will help us understand your current mental state and provide personalized therapy recommendations.
patient.doctorCommunicationDescription: You have an active relationship with a doctor. You can chat and schedule sessions.
patient.doctorCommunicationDescriptionNoActive: Search and contact registered doctors for therapy sessions. Pending requests will appear in the Find Doctors tab.
patient.selectDoctorToChat: Please select a doctor relationship to start chatting.

doctor.description: Manage your patients and track their emotional wellness journey.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.dataSharingDesc: Allow anonymous data sharing for research purposes

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.pushNotificationsDesc: Receive notifications for therapy reminders and updates

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
dataManagement.dataRights: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data at any time. All data is encrypted and stored securely in compliance with privacy regulations.

analysis.facialInstructions: Look directly at the camera and express your current emotions naturally.
analysis.facialTips: Tips: Ensure good lighting, face the camera directly, and keep your face centered in the frame.
analysis.cameraPermissions: Please allow camera permissions when prompted
analysis.voiceInstructions: Click "Start Recording" and speak naturally about how you're feeling for 10-15 seconds.
analysis.textInstructions: Write about your current feelings and thoughts.
analysis.textPlaceholder: Describe how you're feeling right now... Share your thoughts, emotions, and what's on your mind.
analysis.textInputRequired: Please enter some text for analysis

therapy.startFirst: Start your first therapy session to see tracking data here.
therapy.completeSessions: Complete therapy sessions to track your emotional progress.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.allCaughtUp: You're all caught up! Check back later for updates.

contactRequest.title: New Contact Request
contactRequest.message: You have received a contact request from a patient.

requestAccepted.title: Request Accepted
requestAccepted.message: Dr. {{doctorName}} has accepted your contact request. You can now start chatting and schedule sessions.

requestRejected.title: Request Rejected
requestRejected.message: Dr. {{doctorName}} has rejected your contact request. You can send a new request to another doctor.

newMessage.title: New Message
newMessage.message: You have received a new message from {{senderName}}

sessionScheduled.title: Session Scheduled
sessionScheduled.message: A new therapy session has been scheduled.

emotionAlert.title: Emotion Detected
emotionAlert.message: We detected that you're feeling {{emotion}}. Take a moment to breathe and check in with yourself.

motivational.title: You've Got This!
motivational.happy: Your positive energy is wonderful! Keep spreading that joy.
motivational.sad: It's okay to feel sad. Remember, this feeling will pass. You're stronger than you know.
motivational.angry: Anger is a valid emotion. Take deep breaths and give yourself space to process.
motivational.anxious: Anxiety can be overwhelming, but you've handled difficult moments before. You can do this.
motivational.neutral: You're doing great! Keep taking care of yourself.
motivational.fear: Fear is natural, but you're safe. Take one step at a time.
motivational.stressed: Stress is temporary. Remember to breathe and take breaks when needed.

affirmations.1: You are strong and capable of handling whatever comes your way.
affirmations.2: Your feelings are valid, and you deserve support and care.
affirmations.3: Every day is a new opportunity to grow and heal.
affirmations.4: You have the strength within you to overcome challenges.
affirmations.5: Taking care of your mental health is a sign of strength, not weakness.

selfCare.breathing: Take a moment for a breathing exercise. Inhale for 4 counts, hold for 4, exhale for 4.
selfCare.meditation: Time for a quick meditation. Find a quiet space and focus on your breath for 5 minutes.
selfCare.relaxation: Remember to relax. Try some gentle stretching or listen to calming music.
selfCare.therapy: Don't forget your therapy activities today. They're important for your wellness journey.
selfCare.exercise: A little movement can help. Consider a short walk or gentle exercise.

emergency.template: URGENT: Critical emotional distress detected for {{userName}}. Emotion: {{emotion}}, Severity: {{severity}}. Please check on this person immediately.
emergency.title: Emergency Alert
emergency.message: Critical emotional distress has been detected. Emergency contacts have been notified.

contactDoctor.title: Contact Your Doctor
contactDoctor.description: Reach out to your assigned mental health professional for support, questions, or to schedule appointments.
contactDoctor.callRequestSent: Call request sent to {{name}}. They will contact you within 2 hours.
contactDoctor.videoRequestSent: Video session request sent to {{name}}. Check your calendar for available slots.
contactDoctor.appointmentRequestSent: Appointment booking request sent to {{name}}. You'll receive a confirmation email.
contactDoctor.emergencyNotice: For immediate mental health emergencies, please use the Emergency Hotline instead of this contact form.

therapy.title: Therapy & Wellness
therapy.description: Choose from our curated collection of evidence-based therapy techniques designed to support your mental wellness journey.
therapy.emergencyHelpDesc: If you're experiencing a mental health crisis, please reach out to emergency services or a mental health professional.

breathing.title: Deep Breathing Exercise
breathing.description: Guided breathing techniques to activate the parasympathetic nervous system
instructions: Sit comfortably with your back straight
Place one hand on your chest and one on your belly
Breathe in slowly through your nose for 4 counts
Exhale slowly through your mouth for 6 counts

mindfulness.title: Mindfulness Meditation
mindfulness.description: Present-moment awareness practice to reduce stress and improve focus
instructions: Close your eyes and focus on your breathing
Gently return focus to your breath

cbt.title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
cbt.description: Identify and challenge negative thought patterns
instructions: Question the evidence for these thoughts

progressive_relaxation.title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
progressive_relaxation.description: Systematic muscle relaxation to reduce physical tension
instructions: Start with your toes and work upward
Tense each muscle group for 5 seconds
Move to the next muscle group

gratitude.title: Gratitude Practice
gratitude.description: Focus on positive aspects to improve mood and outlook
instructions: Write down 3 things you're grateful for

music_therapy.title: Music Therapy
music_therapy.description: Use music to regulate emotions and reduce stress
instructions: Listen with headphones in a quiet space
Focus on the rhythm and melody

emergency.title: Emergency Hotline
emergency.description: If you're experiencing a mental health crisis, these services are available 24/7 to provide immediate support and assistance.
emergency.criticalAlert: If you're having thoughts of self-harm, please call 988 (US) or your local emergency number immediately.
emergency.notAlone: Remember: You are not alone. Help is always available.

schedule.title: Schedule Session
schedule.sessionScheduleFailed: Failed to schedule session. Please try again.
schedule.notesPlaceholder: Add any notes about this session...
schedule.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this session?

therapyRecommendation.title: Personalized Therapy Assessment
therapyRecommendation.welcome: Welcome to Your Personalized Therapy Journey
therapyRecommendation.allTherapiesCompletedMessage: You've successfully completed all your therapy sessions for today. Great job!
therapyRecommendation.progressSaved: Your progress has been saved. Keep up the great work!
therapyRecommendation.assessmentSubtitle: Based on your emotional analysis, let's create a personalized therapy plan for your mental wellness journey.
therapyRecommendation.assessmentDescription: We'll ask you {{count}} questions to understand your current psychological state and create the best therapy plan for you.
therapyRecommendation.assessmentInstructions: Please answer honestly - this helps us provide personalized recommendations for your mental wellness journey.
therapyRecommendation.question: Question {{current}} of {{total}}
therapyRecommendation.noDisorderDetected: No significant psychological disorders detected. Focus on preventive care and wellness.

questions.moodFrequency: How often do you experience mood changes throughout the day?
questions.sleepPatterns: How would you describe your sleep patterns?
questions.anxietyLevels: How would you rate your anxiety levels?
questions.socialInteraction: How comfortable are you with social interactions?

moodFrequencyOptions.rarely: Rarely - once or twice a week
moodFrequencyOptions.occasionally: Occasionally - a few times a week

questions.concentration: How is your ability to concentrate and focus?
questions.energyLevels: How would you describe your energy levels?
questions.appetiteChanges: Have you noticed any changes in your appetite?
questions.stressTriggers: What are your main sources of stress?

fees.noteText: You can adjust these prices when accepting individual patient requests. These are your default prices that will be shown to all patients.
